0001000111101010 0110000001110111 1 -> sum: 0111001001100010, cout: 0
1001011101000010 1111010101010011 1 -> sum: 1000110010010110, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
